channel.title: [PI]Dragon claws and prayers do not work[PI][HELP]
channel.description:
Since a week i've been figuring out how PI works, I already figured out most things.
But there are a few things which I couldnt fix; Prayers and Dragon claws.
Prayers do not work, NONE! protect doesnt work, ancient curses do not work, protect item does WORK. Any solution on this? I've been checking out NPCHandler.java for a while, prayer.java etc. No succes.
And my other problem is; Dragon claws. The PI client doesnt seem to have the emote + GFX for the dragon claws, the model of the claws works. I've added special, I can see the bar but when I click on it while attacking a NPC it does nothing.
Help please?
